p: The BG-trap (model: BG-Mosquitaire CO 2, Biogents AG, Germany) baited with a steel cylinder filled with CO 2 emitted at a rate of 500g/24h. The trap was placed on the ground, the BG-Lure (Biogents AG, Germany) was placed in the pocket designated for the lure inside the trap, and the steel cylinder was set next to the trap. Each village placed three BG-traps at the peak time of Ae. albopictus with more than 200 meters away from each other, and lasted half an hour. All the captured mosquitoes were collected, and the species were identified morphologically.
